title: How to Heat a Teapot

steps.headline: Fill the teapot with very hot water.
steps.description: This water should not be the water that you intend to make the tea from. Use hot water from the tap or heat some up on the stove.

steps.headline: Swirl the water around the teapot to ensure that all surfaces have been warmed.
Pour it out just before you intend pouring in the tea.
steps.description: There is no need to dry it; simply pour out the water, add the tea leaves or teabags and pour in the tea water.

steps.headline: Relax and enjoy your tea.
steps.description: The second cup should now be almost as warm as the first.
